title: Brunch Burritos
directions: In a large bowl, combine the first nine ingredients. Pour half of the egg mixture into a 4- or 5-qt. slow cooker coated with cooking spray. Top with half of the cheese. Repeat layers.
Cook, covered, on low 4-5 hours or until center is set and a thermometer reads 160Â°.
Spoon 3/4 cup egg mixture across center of each tortilla. Fold bottom and sides of tortilla over filling and roll up. Add toppings of your choice. Yield: 10 servings.
ingredients: 1 pound Jones Dairy Farm All Natural Pork Sausage Roll, cooked and drained
1/2 pound Jones Dairy Farm Dry-Aged Bacon strips, cooked and crumbled
2 cups frozen shredded hash brown potatoes, thawed
1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cheddar cheese soup, undiluted
Optional toppings: jalapeno peppers, salsa or hot pepper sauce
